column5: I am planning a trip to Canada and would like to use leeches for bait. Is it permitted to transport leeches into Ontario for use as bait? Is there a limit on the quantity? What do you do to transport them? Do you use a bait tank with an air pump or plastic bags in a cooler? What is the best method? How do you store them at camp? Thanks, Ohio fisherman
Sorry...no can take Leechs in....buy them there....Good Luck
CAN YOU LEGALLY BRING LEECHES BACK INTO THE U.S. WITH YOU? I HAVE HEARD MIXED REPORTS. DOES ANYONE KNOW FOR SURE? THANKS.
